descriptions.backlog: Task is captured but no work has started. No planning, no implementation.
descriptions.blocked: Work cannot proceed due to an external dependency or unresolved issue.
descriptions.cancelled: Work has been abandoned. No further action will be taken.
descriptions.done: Work is reviewed and shipped. No further action needed.
descriptions.in_planning: Design, dialogue, and scoping underway. No implementation code should be written yet.
descriptions.in_progress: Implementation is actively underway. Code is being written, tested, or integrated.
descriptions.needs_human: A human decision, approval, or input is required before work can continue.
descriptions.planned: Plan is written and approved. Ready for implementation but work has not started.
descriptions.review: Implementation is complete. Work is being reviewed before it can ship.
